system.requirements:
Tier 3; Master Chirurgeon, Methodical Care 
Aptitudes: Intelligence, Knowledge
system.effect: Whenever an ally dies from Blood Loss or due to a failed Characteristic Test, the character has Intelligence Bonus Rounds where they can bring them back from the dead by spending a Fate Point and as a Full Action making a -30 Medicae Test. On success the ally is resuscitated, although not cured of any lost limbs or characteristic damage.
